description: A play on words with 'Brazilian' sounding like 'a bazillion'.
title: Light Work
n_1: Leo stands on a ladder, struggling with a lightbulb.
c2_1: Sure, how many does it take?
n_2: Mia smirks, looking at the bulb.
n_3: Leo pauses, then chuckles at the pun.
n_4: They both laugh as Mia helps Leo.
